mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, reg_date FROM tbl_user ORDER BY reg_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_pw, u.user_name, ug.group_id FROM tbl_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user_group ug ON u.user_id = ug.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{username}
